releases.notes: No real changes, just demo for release tool.

name: Wolfenstein 3D Pain Face
description:
Show your level of pain with a Wolfenstein 3D inspired pain face.

 * Use W'bal, heart rate or power output for the pain source.
 * State of the art graphics (for 1992)
 * May induce feelings of nostalgia.
 * Mein Leben!!!

releases.notes:
version 1.6.5
- Lap data window has an option to trigger a lap based on a power threshold. ie. if you are below the threshold and go above it, trigger a lap and vice versa.  Useful for on/off type of workouts.
- Points Leaderboard has an option to monitor all categories in an event (only if all cats are doing the same route and number of laps).  Only the points for the your category are displayed but the others are recorded and available in the Analysis window.
- Points Leaderboard will refresh quicker (within 5s) after going through a segment - requires an elevation profile window to be running.
- Team badges in the segment results window are now right aligned and the size is configurable in the options
- Names in both the segment results and points leaderboard are now clickable and will bring up the Sauce athlete window.
- Fixed an issue with the segment results window that was causing very slow updates when there were a lot of names to display.

name: Zenmaster
description:
Arend's Mod Collection

* Fully customizable route elevation profiles
* See the active powerups in your group when the HUD is off
* Segment leaderboards
* Preview route and segment profiles
* Pace partner routes and current locations
* Lap data windows for workouts
* Leaderboards for points races

name: Costco Guys BOOM

releases.notes:
primetime release
* hobby project during recovery
* have fun!

description:
